title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back

description: With the help of a talking freeway billboard, a wacky weatherman tries to win the heart of an English newspaper reporter, who is struggling to make sense of the strange world of early 1990s Los Angeles.

title: Deceived
description: A man is murdered when checking authenticity of ancient Egyptian jewelry at a museum. Adrienne finds out after the death of her husband, that he was using a fake name. Are the 2 deaths linked?

title: Necessary Roughness
description: Due to NCAA sanctions, the Texas State University Fightin' Armadillos must form a football team from their actual student body, with no scholarships to help, to play their football schedule.

title: The Hard Way
description: An action movie star researching a role is allowed to tag along with a hardboiled New York City policeman, who finds him superficial and irritating.

title: Other People's Money
description: A corporate raider buys up shares in an undervalued company and falls in love with the founder's son's lawyer/step daughter. Let the battle begin.

title: Aladdin
description: A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
description: One year after Kevin McCallister (Macaulay Culkin) was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

title: Batman Returns
description: Batman returns to the big screen when a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaks havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman.

title: Lethal Weapon 3
description: Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh pursue a former LAPD officer who uses his knowledge of police procedure and policies to steal and sell confiscated guns and ammunition to local street gangs.

title: A Few Good Men
description: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

title: Sister Act
description: When a worldly singer witnesses a mob crime, the police hide her as a nun in a traditional convent where she has trouble fitting in.

title: The Bodyguard
description: A former Secret Service agent takes on the job of bodyguard to an R&B singer, whose lifestyle is most unlike a President's.

title: Wayne's World
description: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

title: Basic Instinct
description: A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder that might involve a manipulative and seductive novelist.

title: A League of Their Own
description: Two sisters join the first female professional baseball league and struggle to help it succeed amidst their own growing rivalry.

title: Unforgiven
description: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny (Clint Eastwood) reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan (Morgan Freeman) and a young man, The "Schofield Kid" (Jaimz Woolvett).

title: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle
description: After her humiliated husband kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against a woman and her family.

title: Under Siege
description: An ex-Navy Seal turned cook is the only person who can stop a group of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. battleship.

title: Dracula
description: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

title: White Men Can't Jump
description: Black and white basketball hustlers join forces to double their chances of winning money on the street courts and in a basketball tournament.

title: The Last of the Mohicans
description: Three trappers protect the daughters of a British Colonel in the midst of the French and Indian War.

title: Boomerang
description: A successful executive and womanizer finds his lifestyle choices have turned back on him when his new female boss turns out to be an even bigger deviant than he is.

title: Scent of a Woman
description: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

title: The Crying Game
description: A British soldier kidnapped by IRA terrorists soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

title: Far and Away
description: A young Irish couple flee to the States, but subsequently struggle to obtain land and prosper freely.

title: Honey, I Blew Up the Kid
description: The Szalinski family is back, this time hilarious disaster strikes when an experiment causes their new toddler son to grow many stories tall.

title: HouseSitter
description: Con artist Gwen moves into Newton's empty home without his knowledge and begins setting up house, posing as his new wife.

title: Death Becomes Her
description: When a woman learns of an immortality treatment, she sees it as a way to outdo her long-time rival.

title: Unlawful Entry
description: A burglar holds a knife to Karen's throat while her husband does nothing. The couple ends befriending the cop that comes. The friendship ends when the cop beats up the culprit. Karen isn't ready to end it. Things get ugly with the cop.

title: Beethoven
description: A slobbering St. Bernard becomes the center of attention for a loving family, but must contend with a dog-napping veterinarian and his henchmen.

title: Forever Young
description: During a cryogenics test, a pilot frozen in 1939 awakes in 1992 but time is running out, as his body starts to age rapidly.

title: Alien³
description: After her last encounter, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on Fiorina 161, a maximum security prison. When a series of strange and deadly events occur shortly after her arrival, Ripley realizes that she has brought along an unwelcome visitor.

title: My Cousin Vinny
description: Two New Yorkers are accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college, and one of their cousins--an inexperienced, loudmouth lawyer not accustomed to Southern rules and manners--comes in to defend them.

title: Sneakers
description: A security pro finds his past coming back to haunt him, when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.

title: The Mighty Ducks
description: A self-centered Minnesota lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

title: Single White Female
description: A woman advertising for a new roommate finds that something very strange is going on with the tenant who decides to move in.

title: The Distinguished Gentleman
description: A conman discovers during a "job" that US Congress is where the money is. "Name recognition" gets him elected. Will he develop a conscience?

title: Medicine Man
description: In the beautiful and dangerous Amazon rainforest, dissimilar people must make their choices between business, science, and love.

title: Passenger 57
description: An airline security expert must take action when he finds himself trapped on a passenger jet when terrorists seize control of it.

title: A River Runs Through It
description: The story about two sons of a stern minister -- one reserved, one rebellious -- growing up in rural Montana while devoted to fly fishing.

title: Encino Man
description: When they find a frozen caveman in their back yard, two high school outcasts thaw him and introduce him to modern life while he in turn gets them to actually enjoy life.

title: Mo' Money
description: A petty crook stalks a cute girl into an office building and is taken for a job applicant. Conning gets him the job. It's in the mail room of new credit cards. 2 superiors are worse crooks.

title: Universal Soldier
description: Private Luc Deveraux and his sadistic sergeant, Andrew Scott, got killed in Viet Nam. The army uses their bodies for a secret project - reanimating dead soldiers as deadly obedient cyborgs. However, their memories come back too.

title: Honeymoon in Vegas
description: Jack loses $65000 in poker in Las Vegas, where he's marrying Betsy. The wedding'll have to wait as the poker winner wants the weekend with Betsy to cancel the debt. She accepts. Whom will she marry?

title: The Lawnmower Man
description: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

title: Sleepwalkers
description: A mother-and-son team of strange supernatural creatures move to a small town to seek out a young virgin to feed on.

title: 3 Ninjas
description: Each year, three brothers visit their grandfather for the summer. He is highly skilled in ninjutsu, and for years he has trained the boys in his techniques.

title: Final Analysis
description: A psychiatrist becomes romantically involved with the sister of one of his patients, but the influence of her controlling gangster husband threatens to destroy them both.

title: Stop! Or My Mom Will Shoot
description: A tough police sergeant's overbearing mother comes to visit him and begins to meddle in his life and career.

title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
description: The Muppet characters tell their version of the classic tale of an old and bitter miser's redemption on Christmas Eve.

title: Howards End
description: A businessman thwarts his wife's bequest of an estate to another woman.

title: Candyman
description: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

title: The Cutting Edge
description: A temperamental figure skater and a former hockey player try to win Olympic gold as a figure skating pairs team.

title: Jurassic Park
description: A pragmatic Paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

title: The Fugitive
description: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.

title: Sleepless in Seattle
description: A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

title: Indecent Proposal
description: A billionaire offers one million dollars to a young married couple for one night with the wife.

title: In the Line of Fire
description: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan (Clint Eastwood) couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.

title: The Pelican Brief
description: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: Cliffhanger
description: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

title: Free Willy
description: When a boy learns that a beloved killer whale is to be killed by the aquarium owners, the boy risks everything to free the whale.

title: Philadelphia
description: When a man with HIV is fired by his law firm because of his condition, he hires a homophobic small time lawyer as the only willing advocate for a wrongful dismissal suit.

title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
description: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

title: Groundhog Day
description: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

title: Grumpy Old Men
description: A lifelong feud between two neighbors since childhood only gets worse when a new female neighbor moves across the street.

title: Dave
description: To avoid a potentially explosive scandal when the U.S. President goes into a coma, an affable temp agency owner with an uncanny resemblance is put in his place.

title: Rising Sun
description: When an escort girl is found dead in the offices of a Japanese company in Los Angeles, detectives Web Smith and John Connor act as liaison between the company's executives and the investigating cop Tom Graham.

title: Demolition Man
description: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
description: Showgirl Deloris Van Cartier (Whoopi Goldberg) returns as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a group of Catholic students whose run-down school is slated for closure.

title: Tombstone
description: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona, are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

title: The Three Musketeers
description: France, 1625: Young d'Artagnan heads to Paris to join the Musketeers but the evil cardinal has disbanded them - save 3. He meets the 3, Athos, Porthos and Aramis, and joins them on their quest to save the king and country.

title: Rookie of the Year
description: When an accident miraculously gives a boy an incredibly powerful pitching arm, he becomes a major league pitcher for the Chicago Cubs.

title: Beethoven's 2nd
description: Beethoven, the St. Bernard dog, becomes a father, but his girlfriend Missy is dognapped, and his puppies are in danger of the same fate.

title: Dennis the Menace
description: When his parents have to go out of town, Dennis stays with Mr. and Mrs. Wilson. The little menace is driving Mr. Wilson crazy, but Dennis is just trying to be helpful. Even to the thief who's arrived in town.

title: Sommersby
description: A farmer returns home from the Civil War, but his wife begins to suspect that the man is an impostor.

title: Last Action Hero
description: With the help of a magic ticket, a young movie fan is transported into the fictional world of his favorite action movie character.

title: Addams Family Values
description: The Addams Family try to rescue their beloved Uncle Fester from his gold-digging new love, a black widow named Debbie.

title: Wayne's World 2
description: The inseparable duo try to organize a rock concert while Wayne must fend off a record producer who has an eye for his girlfriend.

title: Malice
description: A tale about a happily married couple who would like to have children. Tracy teaches art, Andy's a college dean. Things are never the same after she is taken to hospital and operated upon by Jed, a "know all" doctor.

title: Made in America
description: A young black woman discovers that her father was a sperm donor, and if that weren't bad enough, he's white.

title: The Good Son
description: A young boy stays with his aunt and uncle and befriends his cousin, a boy of the same age who shows increasing signs of violent and psychopathic behavior.

title: The Beverly Hillbillies
description: A feature adaptation of the classic television show, when nice guy redneck Jed Clampett strikes it rich when he finds black oil, and moves him and his kin to posh Beverly Hills.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III
description: The turtles find themselves transported back in time to ancient Japan.

title: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey
description: Three pets escape from a California ranch to find their owners in San Francisco.

title: Falling Down
description: An unemployed defense worker frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

title: Hocus Pocus
description: A curious youngster moves to Salem, where he struggles to fit in before awakening a trio of diabolical witches that were executed in the 17th century.

title: What's Love Got to Do with It
description: The story of singer Tina Turner's rise to stardom and how she gained the courage to break free from her abusive husband, Ike Turner.

title: Hot Shots! Part Deux
description: "Rambo" parody in which Topper Harley leads a rescue team into Iraq to save Iraqi war prisoners and all of their previous rescue teams.

title: Carlito's Way
description: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

title: Alive
description: A Uruguayan rugby team stranded in the snow swept Andes are forced to use desperate measures to survive after a plane crash.

title: Son in Law
description: Having gotten a taste of college life, a drastically changed farm girl returns home for Thanksgiving break with her best friend, a flamboyant party animal who is clearly a fish out of water in a small farm town.

title: Sliver
description: A woman moves into an exclusive New York City apartment building, which she soon discovers houses tenants with all manner of shocking secrets.

title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
description: A spoof of Robin Hood in general, and Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves (1991) in particular.

title: Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story
description: A fictionalized account of the life of the martial arts superstar.

title: The Joy Luck Club
description: The life histories of four Asian women and their daughters reflect and guide each other.

title: Hard Target
description: A woman hires a drifter as her guide through New Orleans in search of her father, who has gone missing. They discover a deadly game of cat and mouse behind his disappearance in the process.

title: The Sandlot
description: In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.

title: The Age of Innocence
description: A tale of nineteenth-century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.

title: Cop & ½
description: After witnessing a murder, a young boy named Devon refuses to testify unless he is given the chance to be a policeman.

title: The Lion King
description: A Lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile in despair, only to learn in adulthood his identity and his responsibilities.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

title: True Lies
description: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

title: The Santa Clause
description: When a man inadvertently makes Santa fall off of his roof on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

title: The Flintstones
description: In a parallel modern-day Stone Age world, a working-class family, the Flintstones, are set up for an executive job. But they learn that money can't buy happiness.

title: Dumb and Dumber
description: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen, to return the briefcase to its owner.

title: Clear and Present Danger
description: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

title: Speed
description: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

title: The Mask
description: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
description: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

title: Maverick
description: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

title: The Client
description: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.

title: Disclosure
description: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

title: Star Trek: Generations
description: With the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, Captain Picard must stop a deranged scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter a space matrix.

title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
description: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

title: Stargate
description: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

title: Wolf
description: Publisher Will Randall (Jack Nicholson) becomes a werewolf and has to fight to keep his job.

title: The Specialist
description: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

title: The Little Rascals
description: Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.

title: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
description: Frank Drebin comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.

title: The Crow
description: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

title: Angels in the Outfield
description: When a boy prays for a chance to have a family if the California Angels win the pennant, angels are assigned to make that possible.

title: Little Women
description: The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.

title: When a Man Loves a Woman
description: The seemingly perfect relationship between a man and his wife is tested as a result of her alcoholism.

title: The River Wild
description: Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.

title: D2: The Mighty Ducks
description: Can Gordon's team win the Junior Goodwill Games in California in spite of all the set-backs?

title: Timecop
description: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

title: The Jungle Book
description: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wolves, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

title: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold
description: One year after their first western adventure, Mitch Robbins and his friends discover a treasure map that belonged to their late trail guide Curly and they set out to discover its secrets.

title: Beverly Hills Cop III
description: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who killed his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.

title: Nobody's Fool
description: A stubborn man past his prime reflects on his life of strict independence and seeks more from himself.

title: The Paper
description: New York City tabloid editor Henry's faced with tough decisions while he faces several serious life challenges, and a tempting job offer.

title: On Deadly Ground
description: A mystical martial artist/environmental Agent takes on a ruthless oil corporation.

title: Ri¢hie Ri¢h
description: A rich young boy finds his family targeted in an inside job and must use his cunning to save them.

title: Junior
description: As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body.

title: Nell
description: In a remote woodland cabin, a small town doctor discovers Nell - a beautiful young hermit woman with many secrets.

title: Street Fighter
description: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

title: The Shadow
description: In 1930s New York City, The Shadow (Alec Baldwin) battles his nemesis, Shiwan Khan (John Lone), who is building an atomic bomb.

title: I Love Trouble
description: Peter Brackett and Sabrina Peterson are two competing Chicago newspaper reporters who join forces to unravel the mystery behind a train derailment.

title: Major League II
description: The Indians are now a World Series contender. But last year's hunger is now replaced with complacency, and bad decisions by the new owner threaten to tear the team apart.

title: Blank Check
description: A young boy inadvertently gains possession of a check for $1 million and proceeds to spend it, unaware that the gangsters to whom it belongs are in pursuit.

title: Blown Away
description: An Irish bomber escapes from prison and targets a member of the Boston bomb squad.

title: A Low Down Dirty Shame
description: An ex-cop, now a private detective, takes on the search for the millions stolen by a drug lord.

title: In the Army Now
description: Two misguided youths join the reserves to make some money for their entrepreneurial dreams. No sooner than they finish basic training are they called up to do their part to save the free world.

title: Drop Zone
description: A tough cop teams up with a professional skydiver to capture a renegade computer hacker on the run from the law.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Toy Story
description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

title: Batman Forever
description: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

title: Apollo 13
description: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

title: Pocahontas
description: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth century Virginia.

title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
description: Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.

title: GoldenEye
description: Years after a friend and fellow 00 agent is killed on a joint mission, a secret space based weapons program known as "GoldenEye" is stolen. James Bond sets out to stop a Russian crime syndicate from using the weapon.

title: Se7en
description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: Die Hard with a Vengeance
description: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon Gruber in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

title: Crimson Tide
description: On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger happy Captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.

title: Waterworld
description: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

title: Dangerous Minds
description: An ex-Marine turned teacher struggles to connect with her students in an inner city school.

title: Mr. Holland's Opus
description: A frustrated composer finds fulfillment as a high school music teacher.

title: Congo
description: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

title: Father of the Bride Part II
description: George Banks must deal not only with the pregnancy of his daughter, but also with the unexpected pregnancy of his wife.

title: Braveheart
description: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

title: Get Shorty
description: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

title: The Bridges of Madison County
description: Photographer Robert Kincaid (Clint Eastwood) wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson (Meryl Streep), for four days in the 1960s.

title: Mortal Kombat
description: Three unknowing martial artists are summoned to a mysterious island to compete in a tournament whose outcome will decide the fate of the world.

title: Grumpier Old Men
description: John and Max resolve to save their beloved bait shop from turning into an Italian restaurant, just as its new female owner catches Max's attention.

title: Nine Months
description: When he finds out his longtime girlfriend is pregnant, a commitment-phobe realizes he might have to change his lifestyle for better or much, much worse.

title: Outbreak
description: Army doctors struggle to find a cure for a deadly virus spreading throughout a California town that was brought to America by an African monkey.

title: Heat
description: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

title: Waiting to Exhale
description: Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with the male gender.

title: Babe
description: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

title: Bad Boys
description: Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.

title: The American President
description: A widowed U.S. President running for reelection and an environmental lobbyist fall in love. It's all above-board, but "politics is perception," and sparks fly anyway.

title: Species
description: A group of scientists try to track down and trap a killer alien seductress before she successfully mates with a human.

title: 12 Monkeys
description: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

title: Clueless
description: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.

title: Sabrina
description: An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.

title: Something to Talk About
description: A woman's world is rocked when she discovers her husband is cheating on her.

title: The Net
description: A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

title: Under Siege 2: Dark Territory
description: Casey Ryback hops on a Colorado to LA train to start a vacation with his niece. Early into the trip, terrorists board the train and use it as a mobile HQ to hijack a top secret destructive US satellite.

title: The Brady Bunch Movie
description: The original '70s T.V. family is now placed in the 1990s, where they're even more square and out of place than ever.

title: Casino
description: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive, compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast living and fast loving socialite.

title: Man of the House
description: A young boy refuses to accept his mother's new boyfriend, a lawyer, despite the man's attempts to win his respect. Meanwhile, disgruntled relative of a criminal he prosecuted seek revenge.

title: Dead Man Walking
description: A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.

title: French Kiss
description: A woman flies to France to confront her straying fiancee, but gets into trouble when the charming crook seated next to her uses her for smuggling.

title: Higher Learning
description: People from all different walks of life, encounter racial tension, rape, responsibility, and the meaning of an education on a university campus.

title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
description: A giant egg is unearthed at a construction site and soon opened, releasing the terrible Ivan Ooze, who wreaks vengeance on Zordon for imprisoning him millennia ago. With Zordon dying and their powers lost, the Rangers head to a distant planet to find the mystic warrior Dulcea.

title: First Knight
description: Lancelot falls in love with Guinevere, who is due to be married to King Arthur. Meanwhile, a violent warlord tries to seize power from Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table.

title: Just Cause
description: A Harvard professor is lured back into the courtroom after twenty-five years to take the case of a young black man condemned to death for the horrific murder of a child.

title: To Wong Foo Thanks for Everything, Julie Newmar
description: Three drag queens travel cross-country until their car breaks down, leaving them stranded in a small town.

title: The Indian in the Cupboard
description: Omri, a young boy growing up in Brooklyn, receives an odd variety of presents for his birthday: a wooden cabinet from his older brother, a set of antique keys from his mother and a tiny plastic model of an Indian from his best friend Patrick.

title: A Goofy Movie
description: When Max makes a preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

title: Independence Day
description: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

title: Twister
description: Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.

title: Mission: Impossible
description: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.

title: Jerry Maguire
description: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former secretary.

title: 101 Dalmatians
description: An evil high-fashion designer plots to steal Dalmatian puppies in order to make an extravagant fur coat, but instead creates an extravagant mess.

title: The Rock
description: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

title: The Nutty Professor
description: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

title: The Birdcage
description: A gay cabaret owner and his drag queen companion agree to put up a false straight front so that their son can introduce them to his fiancée's right-wing moralistic parents.

title: A Time to Kill
description: In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his ten-year-old daughter, inciting violent retribution and revenge from the Ku Klux Klan.

title: The First Wives Club
description: Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.

title: Scream
description: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.

title: Eraser
description: A Witness Protection specialist becomes suspicious of his co-workers when dealing with a case involving high-tech weapons.

title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
description: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

title: Michael
description: Two tabloid reporters checking out a report of the Archangel Michael living with an old woman find that it's true. But that's not the only surprise.

title: Star Trek: First Contact
description: The Borg travel back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.

title: The English Patient
description: At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

title: Broken Arrow
description: Terrorists steal nuclear warheads from the U.S. military but don't count on a pilot and park ranger spoiling their plans.

title: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
description: The dim-witted teen duo of Beavis and Butt-Head travel across America in search of their stolen television set.

title: Jingle All the Way
description: A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out of them, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

title: The Cable Guy
description: A lonely and mentally disturbed cable guy raised on television just wants a new friend, but his target, a designer, rejects him, with bad consequences.

title: Courage Under Fire
description: A U.S. Army officer, despondent about a deadly mistake he made, investigates a female chopper commander's worthiness for the Medal of Honor.

title: Jack
description: Because of an unusual disorder that has aged him four times faster than a typical human being, a boy looks like a 40-year-old man as he starts fifth grade at public school after being homeschooled.

title: Primal Fear
description: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.

title: DragonHeart
description: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying Knight must cooperate to stop an evil King, who was given partial immortality.

title: Up Close & Personal
description: An ambitious young woman, determined to build a career in TV journalism, gets good advice from her first boss, and they fall in love.

title: Evita
description: The hit musical based on the life of Evita Duarte, a B-picture Argentinian actress who eventually became the wife of Argentinian president Juan Perón, and the most beloved and hated woman in Argentina.

title: Homeward Bound II: Lost in San Francisco
description: Shadow, Sassy, and Chance have to find their way home after they become stranded at the San Francisco International Airport as their owners fly to Canada on vacation.

title: The Preacher's Wife
description: An angel comes to Earth to help a preacher save his church and his family.

title: Romeo + Juliet
description: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

title: One Fine Day
description: The lives of two strangers and their young children unexpectedly intersect on one hectic, stressful day in New York City.

title: The Mirror Has Two Faces
description: A shy, middle-aged professor enters into a romantic but non-physical relationship with an unlucky-in-love colleague.

title: Happy Gilmore
description: A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house.

title: The Ghost and the Darkness
description: A bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter begin a hunt for two lions after they start attacking local construction workers.

title: Mars Attacks!
description: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

title: Set It Off
description: Desperation drives four inner-city women to bank robbery in Los Angeles, then they start mistrusting each other.

title: A Thin Line Between Love and Hate
description: An observable, fast-talking party man Darnell Wright, gets his punishment when one of his conquests takes it personally and comes back for revenge in this 'Fatal Attraction'-esque comic ...                See full summary »

title: The Truth About Cats & Dogs
description: A successful veternarian & radio show host with low self-esteem asks her model friend to impersonate her when a handsome man wants to see her.

title: Muppet Treasure Island
description: The Muppets' twist on the classic tale.

title: The Long Kiss Goodnight
description: A woman suffering from amnesia begins to recover her memories after trouble from her past finds her again.

title: Striptease
description: A stripper and single mother gets dragged into a dangerous situation after a congressman takes a fancy to her.

title: Matilda
description: Story of a wonderful little girl, who happens to be a genius, and her wonderful teacher vs. the worst parents ever and the worst school principal imaginable.

title: Daylight
description: Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.

title: Black Sheep
description: A gubernatorial candidate hires a wormy special assistant whose only job is to make sure the candidate's well-meaning but incompetent brother doesn't ruin the election.

title: Eddie
description: Coincidences lead to the New York Knicks, getting its loudest fan, Edwina "Eddie" Franklin (Whoopi Goldberg), as coach. Season victory?

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Men in Black
description: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
description: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.

title: Liar Liar
description: A fast-track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after he disappoints his son for the last time.

title: Air Force One
description: Communist Radicals hijack Air Force One with The U.S. President and his family on board. The Vice President negotiates from Washington D.C., while the President, a Veteran, fights to rescue the hostages on board.

title: As Good as It Gets
description: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

title: Good Will Hunting
description: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

title: My Best Friend's Wedding
description: When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

title: Tomorrow Never Dies
description: James Bond sets out to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the U.K in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

title: Face/Off
description: In order to foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent undergoes facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity of a criminal mastermind, who murdered his only son. The plan turns sour when the criminal wakes up prematurely and seeks revenge.

title: Batman & Robin
description: Batman and Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

title: George of the Jungle
description: A man raised in the jungle by apes falls in love with a wealthy American heiress.

title: Scream 2
description: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sydney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.

title: Con Air
description: Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

title: Contact
description: Dr. Ellie Arroway (Jodie Foster), after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

title: Hercules
description: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

title: Flubber
description: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

title: Conspiracy Theory
description: A man obsessed with conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of his theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, in order to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.

title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
description: Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.

title: Dante's Peak
description: A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that the long dormant volcano, Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.

title: L.A. Confidential
description: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen -- one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy -- investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

title: In & Out
description: A midwestern teacher questions his sexuality after a former student makes a comment about him at the Academy Awards.

title: The Fifth Element
description: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

title: Mousehunt
description: Two stumblebum inheritors are determined to rid their antique house of a mouse who is equally determined to stay where he is.

title: The Saint
description: Simon Templar (The Saint), is a thief for hire, whose latest job to steal the secret process for cold fusion puts him at odds with a traitor bent on toppling the Russian government, as well as the woman who holds its secret.

title: The Devil's Advocate
description: An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

title: Kiss the Girls
description: Police hunting for a serial kidnapper are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time.

title: Jungle 2 Jungle
description: A man learns he has a thirteen-year-old son who was raised in the jungle and brings the boy to New York City, turning his life upside down in the process.

title: Anastasia
description: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

title: Spawn
description: An elite mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

title: The Jackal
description: An imprisoned I.R.A. fighter is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.

title: Starship Troopers
description: Humans in a fascist, militaristic future wage war with giant alien bugs.

title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
description: A 1960s secret agent is brought out of cryofreeze to oppose his greatest enemy in the 1990s, where his social attitudes are glaringly out of place.

title: Breakdown
description: A man searches for his missing wife after his car breaks down in the middle of the desert.

title: Absolute Power
description: Career thief Luther Whitney (Clint Eastwood) witnesses a horrific crime involving U.S. President Alan Richmond (Gene Hackman).

title: Volcano
description: A volcano erupts in downtown Los Angeles, threatening to destroy the city.

title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
description: A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.

title: The Game
description: After a wealthy banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down when he becomes unable to distinguish between the game and reality.

title: G.I. Jane
description: A female Senator succeeds in enrolling a woman into Combined Reconnaissance Team training where everyone expects her to fail.

title: Alien: Resurrection
description: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone. Along with a crew of space pirates, she must again battle the deadly aliens and stop them from reaching Earth.

title: The Full Monty
description: Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.

title: The Rainmaker
description: An underdog lawyer takes on a fraudulent insurance company.

title: Bean
description: The bumbling Mr. Bean travels to America when he is given the responsibility of bringing a highly valuable painting to a Los Angeles museum.

title: Cop Land
description: The Sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community, populated by New York City police officers, slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.

title: Nothing to Lose
description: Nick's wife's in bed with his boss. He later gets a gun to his head by a carjacker but steps on the gas pedal. They end up friends after adventures together - holdups, burglary, reckless driving, revenge etc. Twists follow.

title: Amistad
description: In 1839, the revolt of Mende captives aboard a Spanish owned ship causes a major controversy in the United States when the ship is captured off the coast of Long Island. The courts must decide whether the Mende are slaves or legally free.

title: Soul Food
description: One person can keep a family together and, when that one person is gone, a family can be torn apart.

title: Wag the Dog
description: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: Armageddon
description: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

title: There's Something About Mary
description: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

title: A Bug's Life
description: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

title: The Waterboy
description: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

title: Doctor Dolittle
description: A doctor discovers that he can communicate with animals.

title: Rush Hour
description: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

title: Deep Impact
description: A comet is discovered to be on a collision course with Earth. As doomsday nears, the human race prepare for the worst.

title: Godzilla
description: A giant, reptilian monster surfaces, leaving destruction in its wake as it strides into New York City. To stop it, an earthworm scientist, his reporter ex-girlfriend, and other unlikely heroes team up to save their city.

title: Patch Adams
description: The true story of a heroic man, Hunter "Patch" Adams, determined to become a medical doctor because he enjoys helping people. He ventured where no doctor had ventured before, using humour and pathos.

title: Lethal Weapon 4
description: With personal crises and age weighing in on them, LAPD officers Riggs and Murtaugh must contend with deadly Chinese triads that are trying to free their former leaders out of prison and onto American soil.

title: The Truman Show
description: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

title: Mulan
description: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

title: You've Got Mail
description: Two business rivals who despise each other in real life unwittingly fall in love over the Internet.

title: Enemy of the State
description: A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime.

title: The Prince of Egypt
description: Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

title: The Rugrats Movie
description: The babies gets lost in the forest after Tommy Pickles (Elizabeth Daily) gets a new baby brother.

title: Shakespeare in Love
description: The world's greatest ever playwright, William Shakespeare, is young, out of ideas and short of cash, but meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

title: The Mask of Zorro
description: A young thief, seeking revenge for the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who also pursues vengeance of his own.

title: Stepmom
description: A terminally-ill woman must deal with her ex-husband's new lover, who will be their children's stepmother.

title: Antz
description: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

title: The X Files
description: Mulder and Scully must fight the government in a conspiracy and find the truth about an alien colonization of Earth.

title: The Wedding Singer
description: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

title: City of Angels
description: An angel on Earth, a doctor unable to believe, a patient with a secret, a love story made in Heaven.

title: The Horse Whisperer
description: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.

title: Six Days Seven Nights
description: Robin Monroe, a New York magazine editor, and the gruff pilot Quinn Harris must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island.

title: Star Trek: Insurrection
description: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

title: The Parent Trap
description: Identical twins Annie and Hallie, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, later discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.

title: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
description: The Brothers Grimm arrive at the home of a wealthy Grande Dame who speaks of the many legends surrounding the fable of the cinder girl before telling the "true" story of her ancestor.

title: Hope Floats
description: Birdee Calvert must choose between her morals and her heart after her husband divorces her and a charming young man, who her daughter disapproves of, comes back into her life.

title: The Man in the Iron Mask
description: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother whom he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?

title: A Civil Action
description: A tenacious lawyer takes on a case involving a major company responsible for causing several people to be diagnosed with leukemia due to the town's water supply being contaminated, at the risk of bankrupting his firm and career.

title: Snake Eyes
description: A shady police detective finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at an important boxing match in an Atlantic City casino.

title: What Dreams May Come
description: Chris Nielsen dies in an accident, and enters Heaven. But when he discovers that his beloved wife Annie has killed herself out of grief over the loss, he embarks on an afterlife adventure to reunite with her.

title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
description: Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time, as the life of her own son hangs in the balance.

title: Mighty Joe Young
description: A legendary fifteen-foot tall mountain gorilla named Joe is taken to an animal sanctuary in California by a zoologist and a young woman whom he grew up with. A poacher from the past returns to seek vengeance on him.

title: Practical Magic
description: Two witch sisters, raised by their eccentric aunts in a small town, face closed-minded prejudice and a curse which threatens to prevent them ever finding lasting love.

title: Meet Joe Black
description: Death, who takes the form of a young man, asks a media mogul to act as a guide to teach him about life on Earth, and in the process, he falls in love with his guide's daughter.

title: The Negotiator
description: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

title: Ronin
description: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

title: Pleasantville
description: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom, where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

title: The Faculty
description: Students suspect that their teachers are aliens after bizarre occurrences.

title: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
description: The murderous fisherman with a hook is back to once again stalk the two surviving teens, Julie and Ray, who had left him for dead, as well as cause even more murder and mayhem, this time at a posh island resort.

title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
description: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

title: The Sixth Sense
description: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

title: Toy Story 2
description: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
description: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Tarzan
description: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

title: Big Daddy
description: A lazy law school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.

title: The Mummy
description: At an archaeological dig in the ancient city of Hamunaptra, an American serving in the French Foreign Legion accidentally awakens a mummy who begins to wreck havoc as he searches for the reincarnation of his long-lost love.

title: Runaway Bride
description: A reporter is assigned to write a story about a woman who has left a string of fiancés at the altar.

title: The Blair Witch Project
description: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

title: Stuart Little
description: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

title: The Green Mile
description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

title: American Beauty
description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

title: The World Is Not Enough
description: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot while protecting an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

title: Notting Hill
description: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

title: Wild Wild West
description: The two best special agents in the Wild West must save President Grant from the clutches of a diabolical, wheelchair-bound, steampunk-savvy, Confederate scientist bent on revenge for losing the Civil War.

title: Analyze This
description: A comedy about a psychiatrist whose number one patient is an insecure mob boss.

title: The General's Daughter
description: When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.

title: American Pie
description: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

title: Sleepy Hollow
description: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people, with the culprit being the legendary apparition, The Headless Horseman.

title: Inspector Gadget
description: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer.

title: The Haunting
description: When Eleanor, Theo, and Luke decide to take part in a sleep study at a huge mansion they get more than they bargained for when Dr. Marrow tells them of the house's ghostly past.

title: Entrapment
description: An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.

title: Payback
description: After a successful heist, Porter is left for dead. Once he recovers, he seeks vengeance and wants his share of the money.

title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
description: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

title: Deep Blue Sea
description: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer's disease, a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the prey, as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back.

title: Galaxy Quest
description: The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. However, they also have to defend both Earth and the alien race from a reptilian warlord.

title: The Thomas Crown Affair
description: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

title: Blue Streak
description: A former convict poses as a cop to retrieve a diamond he stole years ago.

title: End of Days
description: At the end of the century, Satan visits New York in search of a bride. It's up to an ex-cop who now runs an elite security outfit to stop him.

title: The Bone Collector
description: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

title: Bowfinger
description: When a desperate movie producer fails to get a major star for his bargain basement film, he decides to shoot the film secretly around him.

title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
description: An average aquarium cleaner house-sits for a gigolo, only to be forced to become one himself.

title: Life
description: In 1932, two strangers are wrongfully convicted and develop a strong friendship in prison that lasts them through the 20th century.

title: She's All That
description: A high school jock makes a bet that he can turn an unattractive girl into the school's prom queen.

title: Fantasia 2000
description: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

title: Three Kings
description: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

title: Bicentennial Man
description: An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.

title: The Cider House Rules
description: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

title: Never Been Kissed
description: A newspaper reporter enrolls in high school as part of research for a story.

title: Forces of Nature
description: A soon-to-be-married man encounters an exciting stranger after his plane suffers an accident on takeoff.

title: Varsity Blues
description: A back-up quarterback is chosen to lead a Texas football team to victory after the star quarterback is injured.

title: Message in a Bottle
description: A woman discovers a tragic love letter in a bottle on a beach, and is determined to track down its author.

title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
description: When Cartman and his friends go see an R-rated movie, they start cursing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

title: Stigmata
description: When a young woman becomes afflicted by stigmata, a priest is sent to investigate her case, which may have severe ramifications for his faith and for the Catholic Church itself.

title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
description: On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.

title: Cast Away
description: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

title: Mission: Impossible II
description: I.M.F. Agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney, Australia to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: What Women Want
description: After an accident, a chauvinistic executive gains the ability to hear what women are really thinking.

title: The Perfect Storm
description: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

title: Meet the Parents
description: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

title: X-Men
description: In a world where mutants (evolved super-powered humans) exist and are discriminated against, two groups form for an inevitable clash: the supremacist Brotherhood, and the pacifist X-Men.

title: Scary Movie
description: A year after disposing of the body of a man they accidentally killed, a group of dumb teenagers are stalked by a bumbling serial killer.

title: What Lies Beneath
description: The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind.

title: Dinosaur
description: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sancturary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
description: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

title: Erin Brockovich
description: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

title: Charlie's Angels
description: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

title: Traffic
description: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is a crack addict. Two DEA agents protect an informant. A jailed drug baron's wife attempts to carry on the family business.

title: Big Momma's House
description: In order to protect a beautiful woman and her son from a robber, a male FBI agent disguises himself as a large grandmother.

title: Remember the Titans

title: The Patriot
description: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

title: Chicken Run
description: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

title: Miss Congeniality
description: An F.B.I. Agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.

title: Gone in 60 Seconds
description: A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.

title: Unbreakable
description: A man learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.

title: Me, Myself & Irene
description: A nice-guy cop with dissociative identity disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates.

title: Space Cowboys
description: When retired engineer Frank Corvin (Clint Eastwood) is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

title: The Emperor's New Groove
description: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

description: While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them.

title: U-571

description: The Rugrats travel to Paris, France, where Chuckie (Christine Cavanaugh) hopes to find a new mother and keep his father from marrying an evil business woman.

title: Chocolat
description: A woman and her daughter open a chocolate shop in a small French village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.

title: Shaft
description: New York City police detective John Shaft (nephew of the original 1970s detective) goes on a personal mission to make sure the son of a real estate tycoon is brought to justice after a racially-motivated murder.

title: The Kid
description: An unhappy and disliked image consultant gets a second shot at life when he is mysteriously confronted by an eight-year-old version of himself.

title: Vertical Limit
description: A climber must rescue his sister on top of K2, one of the world's biggest mountains.

title: Road Trip
description: Four college buddies embark on a road trip to retrieve an illicit tape mistakenly mailed to a female friend.

title: Bring It On
description: A champion high school cheerleading squad discovers its previous captain stole all their best routines from an inner-city school and must scramble to compete at this year's championships.

title: 102 Dalmatians
description: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after the puppies once more.

title: Finding Forrester
description: A young writing prodigy finds a mentor in a reclusive author.

title: Rules of Engagement
description: An attorney defends an officer on trial for ordering his troops to fire on civilians after they stormed a U.S. embassy in a Middle Eastern country.

title: The Cell

title: Mission to Mars
description: When the first manned mission to Mars meets with a catastrophic and mysterious disaster after reporting an unidentified structure, a rescue mission is launched to investigate the tragedy and bring back any survivors.

title: Coyote Ugly

title: Shanghai Noon

title: Romeo Must Die
description: An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.

title: Final Destination
description: After a teenager has a terrifying vision of him and his friends dying in a plane crash, he prevents the accident only to have Death hunt them down, one by one.

title: The Road to El Dorado
description: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: Monsters, Inc.
description: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, 2 monsters realize things may not be what they think.

title: Shrek
description: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

title: Rush Hour 2

title: Pearl Harbor

title: Ocean's Eleven

title: Jurassic Park III

title: Planet of the Apes

title: A Beautiful Mind

title: Hannibal

title: The Fast and the Furious
description: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Conner must decide where his loyalty really lies when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.

title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
description: Video game adventurer Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.

title: Dr. Dolittle 2
description: Dolittle must save a forest and a bear's life.

title: Spy Kids
description: The children of secret-agent parents must save them from danger.

title: Black Hawk Down

title: Vanilla Sky

title: The Others

title: Legally Blonde

title: America's Sweethearts

title: Cats & Dogs

title: Save the Last Dance

title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire

title: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
description: An eight year-old boy genius and his friends must rescue their parents after the adults are abducted by aliens.

title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence

title: Training Day
description: On his first day on the job as a Los Angeles narcotics officer, a rookie cop goes beyond a full work day in training within the narcotics division of the L.A.P.D. with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

title: Bridget Jones's Diary
description: A British woman is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.

title: Scary Movie 2
description: Four teens are tricked by Professor Oldman (Tim Curry) into visiting a haunted house for a school project.

title: The Score
description: An aging thief hopes to retire and live off his ill-gotten wealth when a young kid convinces him into doing one last heist.

title: Shallow Hal
description: A shallow man falls in love with a 300-pound woman because of her inner beauty.

title: Swordfish

title: The Mexican

title: Down to Earth

title: The Wedding Planner

title: The Animal
description: After receiving organ transplants from various animal donors, a man finds himself taking on the traits of those animals.

title: Moulin Rouge!
description: A poet falls for a beautiful courtesan whom a jealous duke covets.

title: Rat Race
description: A Las Vegas casino magnate, determined to find a new avenue for wagering, sets up a race for money.

title: A Knight's Tale
description: After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.

title: Don't Say a Word

title: Blow

title: Exit Wounds

title: Enemy at the Gates

title: K-PAX
